parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The sender address. The length cannot exceed 60 characters.

parameters.name: Birthday
parameters.description: The birthday. The length cannot exceed 30 characters.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The recipient email address. The length cannot exceed 60 characters.

parameters.name: Gender
parameters.description: The gender. The length cannot exceed 30 characters.

parameters.name: Mobile
parameters.description: The mobile number. The length cannot exceed 30 characters.

parameters.name: NickName
parameters.description: The nickname. The length cannot exceed 30 characters.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The user name. The length cannot exceed 30 characters.
